class.name: UtilityAIDistanceToNode3DSearchCriterion
class.brief_description: Scores and filters based on minimum and maximum distance to the set [member distance_to] node.
class.description: The [Node3D] distance search criterion can be used to score and filter based on minimum and maximum distance to the set [member distance_to] node.

members.member: The path to the node to which you want to compare the distance to.
Maximum distance. If the distance is more than this and filtering is applied, the tested node is filtered out.
Minimum distance. If the distance is less than this and filtering is applied, the tested node is filtered out.
